metadata.title: CVE-2024-25262 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
texlive-bin commit c515e was discovered to contain heap buffer overflow viathe function ttfLoadHDMX:ttfdump. This vulnerability allows attackers tocause a Denial of Service (DoS) via supplying a crafted TTF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-25262` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libkpathsea6 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
libptexenc1 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
libsynctex2 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
libtexlua53 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
libtexluajit2 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
texlive-binaries - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: texlive-bin package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2').
